Default_verse: The book of the genealogy of Jesus Christ, son of David, son of Abraham.
Text_to_editors: Text to be sent to our editors:
Text_under_checkbox_error:
If you find an error, right-click 
or long press on the verse.
Thanks_report2: Our translation team will be sure to process your request.
introStart:
Here is an interactive guide to the Bible Study App(BSA).
We want to show you the functionality of BSA.
Let's go!
introAppBar:
In the upper part there is an application bar (app bar). On the left is a choice between the Bible and Open Bible Stories (OBS).
In the center there are buttons that display the current address and by click them in the 'Bible' mode you can select a book and a chapter, and in the OBS mode - a history. On the right there is a button that opens the main menu (hamburger menu)
introBookList: The book selection window in the 'Bible' mode. After selecting a book, the chapter selection window will automatically open
introChapterList: Chapter selection window in the 'Bible' mode, or story in OBS mode
introShortCuts:
You can switch a book, chapter, verse using hotkeys (shortcuts):
ctrl + shift + right - next book
ctrl + shift + left - previous book
ctrl + right - next chapter
ctrl + left - previous chapter
ctrl + down - next verse
ctrl + up - previous verse
introWorkSpace: This is a workspace. It contains cards that you can add, delete, change the size, location
introCard: Each card displays the source (Bible translation, OBS, educational resources, resources for translators)
introVerse: You can work with each verse separately. When you click on it, the current reference changes, which allows you to change additional information in open cards with educational resources(TN, TQ, TA, TW)
introContextMenu: When you right-click or press and hold on any verse, the context menu opens. You can copy a verse or send an error message in this verse
introReportDialog: When you use the error sending element, you must specify a comment. After sending the message, a window will open with a link where you can see your message saved on git.door43.org
introHamburger:
The main menu of the application. Here you can:
- add a new card,
- reset the workspace state (the cards will open by default),
- change the font size in the cards,
- change the interface language
- and open user's guide
